scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Includes handwritten draft of Witch Hazel Blooms in November (p. 3-40, 43-108, and 112-13), copy of letter to Jack Jacobs, dated September 16, about screen options to an unnamed script (p. 41-42), journal entries from trip to Nova Scotia (p. 109-11 and 114-127), and miscellaneous notes, including recipes (p. 128-end).
